original_text: And the Lord appeared unto Abram, and said, Unto thy seed will I give this land: and there builded he an altar unto the Lord, who appeared unto him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아브람에게 나타나 이르시되 내가 이 땅을 네 자손에게 주리라 하신지라 자기에게 나타나신 여호와께 그가 그 곳에서 제단을 쌓고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord appeared unto Abram
Unto thy seed will I give this land
and there builded he an altar unto the Lord
